This guide is a simplified overview of '''all non-experimental changes''' in the The Garden Awakens ({{BE}} 1.21.50), which assumes at least some familiarity with the [[Bundles of Bravery]] drop (''Bedrock Edition'' 1.21.40), excluding experimental features in this version.

== Mobs ==
=== New ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|New Mobs}}
|-
| [[Creaking]]
| [[File:Creaking JE1 BE1.png|128px]]
| {{BiomeLink|Pale Garden}}
| None
| Spawn when an activated [[creaking heart]] is triggered at nighttime or during a thunderstorm.
|}

=== Changed ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|Changed Mobs}}
|-
| [[Fox]]
| {{animate|Fox.png;Snow_Fox.png|128px}}
|
* They can now pick up bundles.
* Now periodically play their "mad" sound while defending a player.
|-
| [[Zombified piglin]]
| [[File:Zombified_Piglin_JE9.png|128px]]
| Zombified piglins spawned by nether portals now have a 15-second cooldown before they can use the portal again.
|-
| [[Bee]]
| [[File:Bee.png|128px]]
| Instead of breeding, they get withered when fed [[wither rose]]s, and poisoned by [[eyeblossom]]s – both of these will not anger bees.
|-
| [[Wolf]]
| [[File:Wolf_JE2_BE2.png|128px]]
| Breeding wolves now produce offspring with one the parents' collar colors or a mixture of the parents' collar colors if the colors are compatible.
|}

=== Changed ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|Changed Blocks}}
|-
| [[Copper door]],<br> [[iron door]], [[heavy weighted pressure plate]],<br> [[light weighted pressure plate]],<br> [[polished blackstone pressure plate]]<br>and [[stone pressure plate]]
|{{Animate|Copper Door.png;Exposed Copper Door.png;Weathered Copper Door.png;Oxidized Copper Door.png;Iron Door.png;Heavy Weighted Pressure Plate.png;Light Weighted Pressure Plate.png;Stone Pressure Plate.png|84px}}
| The blocks that require support now always drop when broken with any tool.
|-
| [[Iron bars]], [[iron block]], [[iron trapdoor]],<br>[[iron door]] and [[heavy weighted pressure plate]]
| {{animate|Iron_Bars_(EW).png;Block_of_Iron_JE4_BE3.png;Iron_Trapdoor_JE3_BE2.png;Heavy_Weighted_Pressure_Plate_JE2_BE2.png|84px}}
| Added new break, place, step, fall and hit sounds.
|-
| [[Bamboo]]
| [[File:Leafless_Bamboo_JE1_BE2.png|84px]]
| Pickaxes and shovels no longer mine them as quickly as axes.
|-
| [[Bamboo sapling]]
| [[File:Bamboo_Shoot_JE1_BE1.png|84px]]
|
* Swords can now cut them instantly, as they do bamboo.
* Axes no longer mine them faster.
|-
| [[Block of amethyst]]
| [[File:Block_of_Amethyst_JE3_BE1.png|84px]]
| Adjusted volume & pitch for break, hit, place, fall, step & land sounds for it.
|-
| [[Budding amethyst]]
| [[File:Budding_Amethyst_JE3_BE1.png|84px]]
| Is now slower to mine with an improper tool.
|-
| [[Cobweb]]
| [[File:Cobweb_JE4_BE4.png|84px]]
| Maces no longer mine them faster than other non-sword tools.
|-
| [[Copper trapdoor]] and<br> [[copper bulb]]
|{{Animate|Copper_Trapdoor_JE2_BE2.png;Exposed_Copper_Trapdoor_JE2_BE2.png;Weathered_Copper_Trapdoor_JE2_BE2.png;Oxidized_Copper_Trapdoor_JE2_BE2.png|84px}}
{{Animate|Copper_Bulb_JE1_BE1.png;Exposed_Copper_Bulb_JE1_BE1.png;Weathered_Copper_Bulb_JE1_BE1.png;Oxidized_Copper_Bulb_JE1_BE1.png|84px}}
| They now require a stone pickaxe or better for drops and quick mining.
|-
| [[Crafter]]
| [[File:Crafter_JE4_BE3.png|84px]]
| They now can be mined quickly with any pickaxe.
|-
| [[Dragon egg]]
| [[File:Dragon_Egg_BE1.png|84px]]
| If player somehow manages to mine it, which is almost impossible, it no longer requires a pickaxe to drop and is equally quick to mine with any tool.
|-
| [[Flower]] and <br> [[mushroom]]
|{{animate|Cornflower_JE1_BE1.png;Lily_of_the_Valley_JE1_BE1.png;Poppy_JE8_BE2.png;Dandelion_JE7_BE4.png;Blue_Orchid_JE7_BE2.png;Allium_JE7_BE2.png;Azure_Bluet_JE7_BE2.png;Red_Tulip_JE7_BE2.png;Orange_Tulip_JE7_BE2.png;White_Tulip_JE7_BE2.png;Pink_Tulip_JE7_BE2.png;Oxeye_Daisy_JE7_BE2.png;Peony_JE4_BE3.png;Lilac_JE4_BE2.png;Rose_Bush_JE4_BE3.png;Sunflower_JE6.png;Wither_Rose_JE1_BE1.png;Torchflower_JE1_BE1.png;Pitcher_Plant_JE1_BE1.png;Red_Mushroom_JE9.png;Brown_Mushroom_JE8.png|84px}}
| They no longer generate in the Pale Garden biome.
|-
| [[Heavy core]]
| [[File:Heavy_Core_JE1_BE1.png|84px]]
|
* They are now faster to mine with any improper tool.
* A [[note block]] placed above them now plays the proper sound.
|-
| [[Kelp]]
| [[File:Kelp JE3 BE2.gif|84px]]
| Removed the unintended darker tinting of kelp.
|-
| [[Moss carpet]]
| [[File:Moss_Carpet.png|84px]]
| Axes no longer mine them faster.
|-
| [[Torchflower]] and [[pitcher plant]]
| {{animate|Torchflower_JE1_BE1.png;Pitcher_Plant_JE1_BE1.png|84px}}
| They now increase the probability of a nearby [[sapling]] growing into a [[tree]] with a [[bee nest]].
|}

== Items ==
=== New ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|New Items}}
|-
| [[Resin brick]]
| [[File:Resin_Brick_JE1_BE1.png|84px]]
|
* Can be found in chests in the woodland [[mansion]].
* Can be smelt from resin clump items in a furnace.
{{Smelting
|Resin Clump
|Resin Brick
}}
|
* Can be used to craft [[resin bricks]].
* Can be used to trim armor.
|-
| [[Resin clump]]
| [[File:Resin_Clump_(item)_JE1_BE1.png|84px]]
| Dropped by the resin clump when it is broken.
|
* Can be crafted into a [[block of resin]].
* Can be hardened into [[resin brick]] items in a furnace.
* Can be found in chests in the [[woodland mansion]].
|-
| Creaking [[spawn egg]]
| {{Animate|Creaking Spawn Egg JE1 BE1.png|84px}}
| Obtained from the creative inventory.
| Spawns creaking.
|}

=== Changed ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|Changed Items}}
|-
| [[Mace]]
| [[File:Mace JE1 BE1.png|84px]]
| Mace damage now scales with distance fallen when it is used by mobs.
|-
| [[Suspicious stew]]
| [[File:Suspicious Stew JE1 BE1.png|84px]]
| The effect durations of Suspicious Stew have been adjusted to be the same across versions.
|}

== Biomes ==
=== New ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|New Biomes}}
|-
| [[Pale garden]]
| [[File:Pale Garden.png|324px]]
|
* A variant of [[dark forest]]s.
* [[Woodland mansion]]s do not generate.
| None
|}

=== Changed ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|Changed Biomes}}
|-
| [[Canyon]]
| [[File:Canyon.png|324px]]
|
* Now generate more often.
* Can once again generate on the ocean floor.
* Now properly interact with aquifers, filling with water instead of generating as disconnected segments.
|}

== Gameplay ==
=== New ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|New Gameplay}}
|-
| [[Pause menu]]
| Added ability to pause the game in singleplayer worlds when entering the pause screen, the feature can be turned on/off from the settings in the general section.
|}

=== Changed ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|Changed Gameplay}}
|-
| [[Chat]]s
| There is now a warning message when the player is prevented from entering an unloaded chunk.
|-
| [[Death]]
| Players will keep their inventory after dying on Easy and Peaceful difficulties.
|-
| Collision
| Slightly improved the collision detection between moving blocks and mobs in some cases.
|-
| [[Sleeping]]
| Changed wording for lowest number required for player sleeping to skip the night.
|}
